name: jamesmail
short_description:
javamail system for james3.0 mail server.
　　　Java-based e-mail system is developed, which uses the most popular computer languages ​​(Java language) and SSH (Struts + Spring + Hibernate) framework in present time. On data storage, the system adopts a free, open-source, cross-platform MySQL Database Management Sytsem, mail server uses the free, open-source Apache James mail server which supports SMAP and IMAP email protocols.the interface is simple and generous. The implementation of System will effectively improve work efficiency, reduce the cost of communication between employees, and have a wide spread value.
summary: javamail system for james3.0 mail server
